item.title: Scheduling is made easier with Evie, the AI assistant
item.description:
Mimetic.ai, a tech startup, has introduced Evie, an AI-powered scheduling assistant designed to streamline business meeting arrangements. Evie handles communication with participants, finding suitable times for everyone involved. This significantly reduces the usual email ping-pong, saving users time and increasing productivity. Professionals in fields like recruitment, sales, e-commerce, and entrepreneurship are already benefiting from Evie’s assistance. According to mimetic.ai, setting up a single meeting can involve an average of 4.4 emails...
